publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1339 Mr Jim Wallace: The Scotland Act 1998 (Transfer of Functions to the Scottish Ministers etc.) (No.2) Order 2000-That the Justice and Home Affairs Committee recommends that the draft The Scotland Act 1998 (Transfer of Functions to the Scottish Ministers etc.) (No.2) Order 2000 be approved. Supported by: Iain Gray*
